    private void nineActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
   jTextField1.setText("9");     // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                    

    private void addActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                    
        String u=jTextField1.getText();
f=Integer.parseInt(u);
    jTextField1.setText("+");
    ch='+';   // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                   

    private void substractActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                          
     String v=jTextField1.getText();
f=Integer.parseInt(v);
    jTextField1.setText("-");
    ch='-';   // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                         

    private void multiplyActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
    String i=jTextField1.getText();
f=Integer.parseInt(i);
    jTextField1.setText("*");
    ch='*';// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void divideActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                       
     String t=jTextField1.getText();
f=Integer.parseInt(t);
    jTextField1.setText("/");
    ch='/';     // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                      

    private void oneActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                    
      jTextField1.setText("1");   // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                   

    private void equalsActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                       
if(ch=='+')
{   String a=jTextField1.getText();
    int c=Integer.parseInt(a);
    int res=f+c;
    jTextField1.setText(""+res);
}else if(ch=='-')
{   String q=jTextField1.getText();
    int m=Integer.parseInt(q);
    int res=f-m;
    jTextField1.setText(""+res);
}else if(ch=='*')
{   String w=jTextField1.getText();
    int l=Integer.parseInt(w);
    int res=f*l;
    jTextField1.setText(""+res);
}else if(ch=='/')
{   String y=jTextField1.getText();
    int k=Integer.parseInt(y);
    float res=(float)f/k;
    jTextField1.setText(""+res);
}
// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                      

    private void eightActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
    jTextField1.setText("8");     // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                     

    private void fiveActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
    jTextField1.setText("5");     // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                    

    private void fourActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
   jTextField1.setText("4");      // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                    

    private void threeActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
  jTextField1.setText("3");       // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                     

    private void twoActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                    
     jTextField1.setText("2");   // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                   

    private void sixActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                    
     jTextField1.setText("6");   // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                   

    private void sevenActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
   jTextField1.setText("7");      // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                     

    private void zeroActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
     jTextField1.setText("0");    // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                    

    private void clearActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
      jTextField1.setText("");     // TODO add your handling code here:
  
    }
